channel.title: Live Mode by Default
channel.description: Is it possible to set some setting in VirtualBox so that Whonix-Workstation is always running in live mode by default? (so instead of automatically picking the top boot mode, can I make VirtualBox autoselect the Whonix VM live mode?) Of course it would still be possible to use persistent modes, live would just be chosen if no input is given.
